item.title: monit helper for quota monitoring in go
item.description: I want to keep under control a system where each user has an amount of filesystem quota reserved; in particular I would like to get notified if and when a user exceeds some treshold. Since I already have Monit in place in the server, I took the chance to write a small Go utility in order to retrieve the quota percentage. This is also an example on how to run external programs in Go and filter the output using regular expressions.
